pullrequest.title: Replace joint frame references with Jc and Jp

content.raw: ok, it's bad if the figures conflict with each other and are confusing, but I thought it was helpful to have the two similar figures for SDF and URDF to show the differences. they are more like cartoon figures that wouldn't be part of an academic paper, but I think they are more accessible than the excellent figure you provided.
content.html: ok, it's bad if the figures conflict with each other and are confusing, but I thought it was helpful to have the two similar figures for SDF and URDF to show the differences. they are more like cartoon figures that wouldn't be part of an academic paper, but I think they are more accessible than the excellent figure you provided.
